description: Ganoshotru is an upcoming Bengali Crime Thriller anthology series that follows the lives of the five most dangerous enemies of Bengal. This series explores their lives and delves deeper to showcase their transformation journey.
title: Ganoshotru OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch the Bengali Crime-Thriller Online

description: Transient Lunar Phenomena are mysterious bursts and glows observed on the Moon, lasting from milliseconds to hours. NASA and ESA research show that these events often result from meteoroid impacts, radon gas outgassing, and dust charged by solar wind, illuminating the Moon’s dynamic surface in surprising ways.
title: NASA and ESA Trace Mysterious Lunar Flashes to Meteors and Gas Leaks

description: Samsung Galaxy XR 'Project Moohan' headset is set to launch today at 7:30 AM IST during the South Korean tech company's October 2025 Galaxy event. Reports suggest that Samsung's first extended reality (XR) headset could be priced between KRW 2.5 million (roughly Rs. 1,54,000) and KRW 4 million (about Rs. 2,46,000). They could be powered by a Snapdragon XR2+ Gen 2 chipset and sport 4K resolution micro-OLED displays with 4,032 ppi pixel density.
title: Samsung Galaxy XR Headset Launching Today: Know Price, Features, and Specifications

description: Scientists studying Mount Etna have found that changes in the “b-value” ratio of earthquakes can signal magma movement before eruptions. Using nearly 20 years of data, this discovery could enhance volcanic early warning systems globally, potentially saving lives in regions near active volcanoes.
title: Scientists Discover New Seismic Clue to Predict Mount Etna Eruptions

description: A team from the University of Otago, alongside Google and the Chinese Academy of Sciences, has achieved an unprecedented breakthrough in GPS accuracy for smartwatches. The device can now pinpoint a location to within eight centimetres, potentially transforming the future of wearable technology for fitness tracking, navigation, and personal safety applications
title: Smartwatch Breakthrough Brings GPS Accuracy Down to a Few Centimetres

description: SpaceX reached a new milestone by launching its 10,000th Starlink satellite aboard a Falcon 9 rocket on October 19, 2025. The record-setting 132nd launch of the year underscores Starlink’s rapid growth, expanding global internet coverage and strengthening its role as the world’s largest satellite constellation.
title: SpaceX Launches 10,000th Starlink Satellite, Sets New Annual Record

description: Valsala Club captures the spirit of rural Kerala through humor, rivalry, and generational change. The movie stands out for its original premise and relatable themes about evolving traditions. Critics have praised the direction, performances, and balance of satire with sentiment. As the youth take on age-old customs, the story highlights how laughter can challenge even the most rigid traditions
title: Valsala Club Is Streaming Now: Know All About the Malayali Comedy-Drama Movie

description: Mr Shudai is a Punjabi horror-comedy movie that is releasing soon on the OTT platforms. It stars Harsimran in the lead role.
title: Mr Shudai OTT Release: Know When and Where to Watch the Punjabi Horror-Comedy

description: OpenAI introduced ChatGPT Atlas, its first artificial intelligence (AI)-powered web browser on Tuesday. This now becomes the San Francisco-based AI giant's third consumer product, followed by ChatGPT and the Sora app. Available exclusively for macOS, ChatGPT Atlas is integrated with GPT-5 AI model and can perform several tasks for users.
title: OpenAI Introduces ChatGPT Atlas, an AI-Powered Web Browser With Agentic Capabilities

description: NASA reopened its $2.9 billion Artemis 3 lunar lander contract as SpaceX’s Starship delays threaten to push the crewed Moon landing to 2028. Administrator Sean Duffy expressed concern, while Blue Origin reenters the race, promising to deliver faster progress toward humanity’s next lunar return.
title: SpaceX May Miss First Crewed Moon Landing as NASA Reopens Artemis Bid

description: Mozilla has fixed multiple high-severity vulnerabilities across Firefox, Firefox ESR, and Thunderbird, which could allow attackers to execute code or access sensitive data. The flaws, affecting Firefox versions prior to 144, ESR versions prior to 115.29 and 140.4, and Thunderbird versions prior to 140.4 and 144, include use-after-free errors, memory corruption, API misuse, and cross-process data leaks. CERT-In has urged individuals and organisations to update immediately using Mozilla’s patches to prevent data theft, system compromise, and information disclosure.
title: CERT-In Asks Mozilla Firefox Users to Install Browser Updates to Remain Safe From Security Vulnerabilities

description: Baai Tujhyapayi is an upcoming marathi web series that stars Sajiri Joshi in the key role. The series revolve around an ambitious girl who challenges age-old norms of the society restricting education.
title: Baai Tujhyapayi OTT Release Date Revealed: Know Everything About Streaming, Plot, Cast, and More

description: Oppo's Peter Dohyung Lee, Head of Product Strategy, details the "Built for India" durability strategy in an exclusive chat with Gadgets 360. Lee touched upon how Oppo is tackling the phone damage anxiety with design enhancements for users in India. Additionally, he detailed how the company is following the 'Built for India' strategy alongside democratising innovation from the Oppo Find series down to the affordable range.
title: Beyond Specs: How Oppo is Focusing on Battery Health and Reliability

description: BSNL, the government-owned telecom service provider (TSP), has announced a new plan for new senior citizen subscribers. Dubbed the BSNL Samman Plan, it offers unlimited calling for 365 days, 2GB data per day, and a free SIM card. This is a limited-time offer, which will be available till November 18. The new plan is exclusively for people aged 60 and above. It comes as part of the TSP’s Diwali Bonanza offers, which bring discounted tariffs and additional benefits during the festive season.
title: BSNL Samman Plan Announced For New Senior Citizen Users: Price, Benefits

description: Daksha: The Deadly Conspiracy, directed by Vamsee Krishna Malla, stars Lakshmi Manchu in a gripping tale of crime and supernatural intrigue. Now streaming on Prime Video from October 17, 2025, the film explores betrayal, corruption, and dark powers in a visually intense and emotionally charged narrative
title: Daksha: The Deadly Conspiracy Is Streaming Now: Know All About This Mohan Babu, Lakshmi Manchu Starrer

description: OnePlus 15 will debut in China on October 27, with an India launch expected soon as its microsite is live. It will introduce new gaming-focused technologies like the G2 network chip, “Touch Display Sync,” and “Glacier” cooling system. The handset will launch in Absolute Black, Misty Purple, and Sand Dune colours. The phone will feature a 1.5K BOE Flexible Oriental OLED display with a 165Hz refresh rate, Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC, and a 7,300mAh battery supporting 120W wired and 50W wireless charging.
title: OnePlus 15 Launch in India Teased via Microsite; Company Reveals Key Features Ahead of China Debut

description: OxygenOS 16, based on Android 16, began rolling out on October 16 with a new translucent design, AI-powered features, and expanded customisation. The update refines the Quick Settings layout, adds theming across app icons, and enhances the Mind Space tool with Gemini integration. It also improves the Recorder app with live transcription and AI summaries.
title: OxygenOS 16 Update Out Now: Here Are 5 Biggest New Features Coming to These OnePlus Devices

description: Poco F8 Ultra has been listed on the NBTC website with model number 25102PCBEG. The listing shows that the smartphone supports GSM, WCDMA, LTE, and NR networks, indicating 5G connectivity. The handset is manufactured in China. It is expected to arrive as a global variant of Redmi K90 Pro or Redmi K90 Pro Max. The Poco F8 Ultra is rumoured to come with the Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset.
title: Poco F8 Ultra Listing on NBTC Certification Website Hints at Imminent Launch

description: As per a new research by Omdia, India’s smartphone shipments surged 3 percent YoY growth in the July-September period (Q3) in 2025, with total shipments touching 48.4 million units. The growth is driven by the early festive season and new launches.  Vivo retained its lead with a 20 percent market share, followed closely by Samsung. Xiaomi came in the third position while Oppo and Apple rounded out the top five.
title: Vivo Led Market as Smartphone Shipments in India Rose 3 Percent YoY in Q3 2025: Omdia

description: The Realme GT 8 Pro, Vivo X300 Pro, and Poco Pad M1 have appeared on the UAE’s TDRA certification site, suggesting upcoming global launches. The Realme GT 8 Pro is expected to feature a 200-megapixel periscope camera and a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chip, while the Vivo X300 Pro will include a 200-megapixel telephoto lens and a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chip. The Wi-Fi-only Poco Pad M1 will likely be a rebranded Redmi Pad 2 Pro with a Snapdragon 7s Gen 4 SoC and 12,000mAh battery.
title: Vivo X300 Pro, Realme GT 8 Pro and Poco Pad M1 Listed on TDRA Site, Could Launch Soon

description: WhatsApp is reportedly working on the option to let users limit sending messages in new chats without replies. The feature has been spotted on the WhatsApp for Android beta  2.25.31.5 version, which is available via the Google Play Beta programme. It will reportedly be available to both individuals and businesses.
title: WhatsApp Will Soon Crack Down on Spam by Limiting Messages in New Chats: Report

description: DeepSeek has unveiled DeepSeek-OCR, an open-source AI model that processes text by converting it into images using 2D mapping. This new “Context Optical Compression” approach allows large language models to handle longer documents with fewer tokens and improved accuracy. The method has drawn praise for its potential to simplify and speed up text reasoning.
title: DeepSeek-OCR Open-Source AI Model Changes How AI Models Read and Process Plain Text

description: Amazon Web Services (AWS) faced a widespread outage on October 20, disrupting several major platforms, including Apple TV, Reddit, and Snapchat. The outage, lasting nearly 12 hours, coincided with Diwali celebrations in India and affected online businesses running festive campaigns. AWS later attributed the issue to a DNS error in its US-East-1 region.
title: Diwali Blackout: How the AWS Outage Crippled Major Apps Across the World

description: WhatsApp has updated its Business Solution policy to ban third-party artificial intelligence (AI) chatbot providers from the platform. The changes will come into force early next year. It will effectively stop OpenAI, Perplexity, among other AI assistant companies from offering their services on the instant messaging app. This move will make Meta AI assistant the sole AI chatbot on WhatsApp, potentially thwarting competition.
title: WhatsApp Blocks AI Firms From Offering Chatbot Access via WhatsApp Business API

description: iQOO 15 was released recently with a 7,000mAh battery, triple rear cameras and Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset. Here’s a side-by-side comparison of the newly launched iQOO 15 and Apple's premium iPhone 17 Pro Max, analysing their specifications and pricing to help you understand how they stack up against one another across performance.
title: iQOO 15 vs iPhone 17 Pro Max: Features, Price and Specifications Compared

description: Jio has upgraded its business broadband plans by bundling JioAICloud Enterprise storage, combining internet, cloud, and voice services in one package. The Rs. 801 plan offers up to 100Mbps speeds, 100GB cloud storage, a 39,600GB annual data quota, and a voice line with unlimited calling. The Rs. 1,001 plan provides 200Mbps speeds, 200GB cloud storage, the same data quota, and a voice line. The integration aims to help businesses manage data and collaborate efficiently, targeting small and medium enterprises.
title: Jio Updates Business Broadband Plans With JioCloud Storage: See Price, Benefits

description: OpenAI has reinforced Sora’s safeguards to block unauthorised use of celebrity and public figure likenesses in AI-generated videos. The update follows concerns raised by actor Bryan Cranston and a joint statement with SAG-AFTRA. The move aligns with the proposed No Fakes Act, aimed at protecting artists’ digital identities.
title: OpenAI to Stop Users From Generating Sora Videos of Celebrities Without Consent After Backlash

description: Realme GT 8 Pro and Realme GT 8 launched in China on Tuesday at the company's October 2025 event. The new handsets are the first to come out of Ricoh and Realme's recently announced partnership. Both are powered by a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 chipset and an R1 X graphics chip. The Pro model packs a 7,000mAh battery, too. It sports a 2K resolution screen, which offers up to a 144Hz refresh rate.
title: Realme GT 8 Pro With Ricoh GR Optics, 7,000mAh Battery Launched Alongside Realme GT 8: Price, Specifications

description: The Redmi K90 Pro Max will launch in China on October 23 alongside the vanilla K90. It will feature a 6.9-inch OLED display with DC dimming, and a circular polariser. The phone will be powered by Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC paired with Xiaomi’s D2 AI display chip and a large vapour cooling chamber. Camera setup will include a 1/1.31-inch main sensor, 50-megapixel ultrawide shooter, and a periscope telephoto lens with 5x optical zoom. It will house a 7,560mAh battery and Bose-tuned stereo speakers.
title: Redmi K90 Pro Max Key Features Confirmed; Will Feature 6.9-inch Display, Periscope Telephoto Camera

description: Anthropic has expanded Claude Code to the web, letting paid users access the AI-powered coding tool without installing a CLI. Now available as a research preview, the web version supports GitHub integration and parallel coding tasks in isolated environments. The company has also launched a mobile version through its Claude iOS app.
title: Anthropic Launches Claude Code on the Web, Lets Users Assign Parallel Coding Tasks

description: iQOO 15 was launched in China during iQOO's October 2025 hardware launch event. The phone is powered by the latest Snapdragon chipset, paired with up to 16GB of RAM and up to 1TB storage. It is equipped with a 7,000mAh battery, too. This is the first iQOO flagship to support wireless charging. The handset sports a Samsung M14 AMOLED display with up to 144Hz refresh rate. It supports Bluetooth 6 and Wi-Fi 7 for connectivity, and features an in-display fingerprint scanner for unlocking it.
title: iQOO 15 Launched With Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5, Three 50-Megapixel Rear Cameras: Price, Specifications

description: iQOO has launched the iQOO Pad 5e in China alongside the iQOO 15, while also unveiling the iQOO Watch GT 2 and iQOO TWS 5. The iQOO Pad 5e features a 12.05-inch 2.8K display, Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 SoC, and a 10,000mAh battery. The iQOO Watch GT 2 offers a 2.07-inch AMOLED display with LTE eSIM support, while the iQOO TWS 5 earbuds provide up to 60dB noise cancellation, LDAC audio, and 48 hours of claimed total playback time.
title: iQOO Pad 5e With Snapdragon 8 Gen 3 Chip Launched Alongside iQOO Watch GT 2 and iQOO TWS 5

description: Microsoft and Asus launched the new Xbox-branded Ally handhelds this month. The ROG Xbox Ally and the ROG Xbox Ally X are priced at $599.99 and $999.99, respectively. Now, Xbox president Sarah Bond has said that Asus largely set the guidance for pricing for the devices based on their features and other factors.
title: Microsoft Says Asus Determined Pricing for ROG Xbox Ally Handhelds Based on Features, Other Factors

description: OnePlus 15 launch is only a few days away. Recently, the company revealed the colourways of the handset. Now, the tech firm has confirmed that the OnePlus 15 will pack a 7,300mAh battery with 100W wired and 50W wireless fast charging support. This is a larger battery than its predecessor, the OnePlus 13, which carries a 6,000mAh battery with similar wired and wireless charging speeds. Powering the handset will be a Snapdragon 8 Elite Gen 5 SoC.
title: OnePlus 15 Battery Capacity, Charging Speed Teased Ahead of October 27 Launch

description: Realme GT 8 is confirmed to launch in Green, Navi, and White colours. It is teased to come in circular camera module seen on the GT 8 Pro. It will be equipped with a Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset. It will sport a 2K display with a 144Hz refresh rate. The handset will have a R1 graphics chip for gaming. It will pack a 7,000mAh battery.
title: Realme GT 8 Colourways Revealed Ahead of Launch; Confirmed to Feature 7,000mAh Battery

description: iOS 26.1 beta 4 brings a new toggle for users to switch to a more opaque version of the Liquid Glass design. This new option brings more visual calrity for the Liquid Glass design. The option is also available on iPadOS 26.1 and macOS 26.1. It can be spotted on the iPhone and iPad by going to the Settings app and heading to the Display & Brightness menu.
title: Apple's iOS 26.1 Beta 4 Adds an Option to Tone Down Liquid Glass Transparency

description: Meta AI’s popularity has reportedly surged, driven by its new Vibes feature, an image-to-video generator with a public sharing feed similar to Instagram Reels. Data from Similarweb (via TechCrunch) shows sharp growth in app downloads and daily users since late September, suggesting that accessibility and creativity are fuelling the rise.
title: Meta AI App Has Reportedly Gained Popularity With the Vibes Features

description: Sony’s WH-1000XM6 active noise cancellation headphones pack a punch not only when it comes to audio quality but features as well. Sony this time is laser focussed on the customisation aspect which results in a high-customised audio and noise cancellation experience, which can be personalised to a user’s requirements.
title: Sony WH-1000XM6 Review: The Best Just Got Better
